metadata.name: The Earth abounds
metadata.description:
Animation "The Earth abounds" 
The animation is created from a unique author's painting. The painting itself is the author's style of Ukrainian decorative painting.
This work was created as a mural at the House of Culture in the Donetsk region, in the Soledar city  (2021). This picture exists in augmented reality - "moving mural" AR. "The Earth Abounds" is a story about the prosperity of the Ukrainian land. This is a picture that shows the beauty and richness of Ukrainian nature, diversity and freedom that abounds and inspires.
3838Ð¥2096, H264.
